title: URGENT!!! bug?
body: So for the past month every update league has it takes about 30 mins stuck on scanning 2 files then it will start downloading the patch though it downloads at about 4KBps and this can take so long, now ive tried reinstalling the game several of times, ive used different internet connections and it changes nothing does anyone know a fix?

replies.body:
Hey Krispy Kreme,

Have you tried the solutions in the patching troubleshooting thread? 

http://boards.oce.leagueoflegends.com/en/c/help-support-oce/PuEpZLzo-having-patching-issues-try-these-solutions

Let me know if it works!
